name: Dodger (kladspear)
description:
I'm beginning pygame development by recreating games from https://inventwithpython.com/blog/2012/02/20/i-need-practice-programming-49-ideas-for-game-clones-to-code/

This is Dodger.

Controls:

Left arrow -> Go Left

Right arrow -> Go Right

Up arrow - > Go Up

Down arrow - > Go Down
